Putting all together in a C program:

#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

int main() {
    int x, y;
    scanf("%d %d", &x, &y);
    int a = 0;
    while ( (x >= 0 && y >= 22) || (x >= 1 && y >= 12) || (x >= 2 && y >= 2) ) {
        if (a) {
            if (y >= 22) {
                y -= 22;
            } else if (x >= 1 && y >= 12) {
                x -= 1;
                y -= 12;
            } else {
                x -= 2;
                y -= 2;
            }
        } else {
            if (x >= 2 && y >= 2) {
                x -= 2;
                y -= 2;
            } else if (x >= 1 && y >= 12) {
                x -= 1;
                y -= 12;
            } else {
                y -= 22;
            }
        }
        a = 1 - a;
    }
    char first_output[7];
    if (a == 1) {
        strcpy(first_output, "Ciel");
    } else {
        strcpy(first_output, "Hanako");
    }
    int counts[256] = {0};
    for (int i = 0; first_output[i] != '\0'; i++) {
        counts[first_output[i]]++;
    }
    int cnt_odds = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
        if (counts[i] % 2 != 0) {
            cnt_odds++;
        }
    }
    int x_second = (cnt_odds <= 1);
    if (x_second) {
        printf("First\n");
    } else {
        if (strlen(first_output) % 2 == 0) {
            printf("Second\n");
        } else {
            printf("First\n");
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
